summary: This is an email chain from July 2, 2020, regarding the charging of Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes a forwarded press release from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York announcing the charges and a brief exchange between two individuals discussing the situation and potential cooperation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the co-conspirator with Ghislaine Maxwell in the sexual abuse of minors.

connections.description: Charged together for conspiring to sexually abuse minors.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Charged
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was formally charged on July 2, 2020, for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.
The charging announcement originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email exchange references a need to 'figure out this cooperation situation,' suggesting discussions about potential cooperation agreements.
